content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Risk assessment is a worldwide known and widely used approach. Risk is uncertainty in objectives achievement. When there is a lack of information and different factors influence the needed results, risks arise.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"General information about risk management can be found in the international standard ISO 31000:2018 “Risk management — Guidelines”. More information on different risks assessment techniques can be found in the international standard IEC 31010:2019 “Risk management — Risk assessment techniques”.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In EPAM, risk assessment is an important part of Quality management, Project management, Security management, Health & safety and Environmental management. Risk management is integrated into EPAM QMS Process
